      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Calculate()
      Lights never move, overridden as no calculations are needed

      Override for collide so lights do not collide

      Overridden to draw the outside of the light, then the inside, no arrow required
      void DrawLight(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Function for drawing a light around the light robot, with a radius of brightness
      double getBrightness()
      This robot has a brightness, so its brightness is returned, this is used for calculating light robots.
